summary: This document is a summary of account balances for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust at Deutsche Bank for the month of May 2018. It details transactions, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, providing insight into the financial activities associated with the trust during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the beneficiary of the insurance trust, which is the subject of the financial record.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned in the context of providing personal assistance related to the account.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust for May 2018.
The beginning balance on May 1, 2018, was $5,276.65.
There were no checks paid during the statement period.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 for the month.
The ending balance as of May 31, 2018, remained at $5,276.65.
